noVolunteersDescription: There are currently no volunteers in the system. Click below to add your first volunteer!
importDescription: Import volunteers from a CSV file. Download the sample file to see the required format.
downloadTemplateDescription: Download a sample CSV file with the correct format. Use this as a template for your import file.
uploadCsvDescription: Select a CSV file containing volunteer data. The file should follow the format shown in the sample file.

topVolunteers.title: Top Volunteers
topVolunteers.description: Based on total hours and sessions

filters.moreFiltersDescription: Apply additional filters to refine your volunteer list.

dialogs.addNewVolunteerDescription: Fill in the details to add a new volunteer to your community.
dialogs.editVolunteerDescription: Update the volunteer's information and preferences.
dialogs.deleteVolunteerDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this volunteer? This action cannot be undone.
dialogs.deleteSelectedVolunteersDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the selected volunteers? This action cannot be undone.

forms.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
forms.notesPlaceholder: Enter any additional notes about the volunteer

errors.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
errors.createVolunteerError: Error creating volunteer. Please try again.
errors.updateVolunteerError: Error updating volunteer. Please try again.
errors.bulkActionError: Please select at least one volunteer to perform this action.
errors.exportError: Please select at least one volunteer to export.
errors.importError: Error importing volunteers. Please check the file format and try again.
errors.processingError: Error processing file. Please check the format and try again.
errors.headerOrderError: CSV header order does not match the required format. Please use the sample file as a template.
errors.missingRequiredFields: Missing required fields (name, phone, or birth date)
errors.cannotDeleteWithSessions: Cannot delete volunteer with at least one session.
errors.generateUsernameError: Failed to generate a unique username after multiple attempts
errors.createVolunteerErrorDescription: An error occurred while creating the volunteer. Please try again or contact support.
errors.invalidPhoneNumberDescription: Enter a valid phone number (international like +1 212 555 0123, or local digits).
errors.invalidFullNameDescription: Full name can only contain English letters, Hebrew letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes
errors.fullNameTooShort: Full name must be at least 2 characters long
errors.fullNameInvalid: Full name can only contain English letters, Hebrew letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes
errors.invalidUsernameDescription: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens
errors.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters long
errors.usernameInvalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens
errors.invalidPasswordDescription: Password must meet all security requirements
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.passwordNoUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.passwordNoLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
errors.passwordNoNumber: Password must contain at least one number
errors.passwordNoSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character
errors.passwordInvalid: Password does not meet security requirements
errors.invalidBirthDateDescription: Please enter a valid birth date within the acceptable range
errors.birthDateInvalid: Please enter a valid birth date
errors.birthDateTooOld: Birth year must be 1900 or later
errors.birthDateTooYoung: Person must be at least 16 years old
errors.birthDateFuture: Birth date cannot be in the future

validation.invalidPhoneNumber: Enter a valid phone number (international like +1 212 555 0123, or local digits).

importDialog.title: Import Volunteers
importDialog.description: Import volunteers from a CSV file. Download the sample file to see the required format.

uploadSection.title: Upload CSV File
uploadSection.description: Select a CSV file containing volunteer data. The file should follow the format shown in the sample file.

sampleSection.title: Sample File
sampleSection.description: Download a sample CSV file with the correct format. Use this as a template for your import file.
